events.name: onAction
events.description: Handler that is called when an item is selected.

events.name: onSelectionChange
events.description: Handler that is called when the selection changes.

events.name: onClose
events.description: Handler that is called when the menu should close after selecting an item.

children\\*.description: The contents of the collection. It's usually the `DropdownItem` or `DropdownSection`. (static)

selectionMode.description: The type of selection that is allowed in the collection.

selectedKeys.description: The currently selected keys in the collection (controlled).

disabledKeys.description: The item keys that are disabled. These items cannot be selected, focused, or otherwise interacted with.

defaultSelectedKeys.description: The initial selected keys in the collection (uncontrolled).

disallowEmptySelection.description: Whether the collection allows empty selection.

autoFocus.description: Where the focus should be set.

closeOnSelect.description: Whether the dropdown menu should be closed when an item is selected.

disableAnimation.description: Whether to disable the animation of the dropdown items.

itemClasses.description: Allows to set custom class names for the dropdown item slots.
